top_actions.description: Narrow the scope of the 'what' question by adding contextual constraints.
Add specific insurance terminology to define the 'what' concept more clearly.
Convert the 'what' question into a comparative format (e.g., 'what is X compared to Y').
Incorporate regulatory considerations into the 'how' question.
Transform the 'how' question into a numbered step-by-step request format.
Add a request for implementation timeline to the 'how' question.
Add specific conditional parameters to the 'if/can' question.
Transform the 'if/can' question to give a yes/no response first before answering.
Add a request for statistical likelihood in the 'if/can' question.
